parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain secured by the SSL certificate. HTTPS secure acceleration is enabled for the accelerated domain name.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1 to 1000**.

parameters.name: SearchKeyword
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to query the certificate.
